description: Single storey rear extension; alteration of roof from hip to gable end; rear roof extension incorporating a Juliet balcony (following demolition of existing dormers)
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): Location Plan, Block Plan, GD04.10_01 Existing Ground and First Floor Plans, GD04.10_02 Existing Loft and Roof Plans, GD04.10_03 Existing Front and Rear Elevations, GD04.10_04 Existing Side Elevation, GD04.10_05.3 Proposed Ground and First Floor, GD04.10_06 Proposed Loft and Roof Plans, GD04.10_07 Proposed Front and Rear Elevations, GD04.10_08 Proposed Side Elevation, Design & Access Statement.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | The materials to be used for the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing, unless where stated on either the submitted application form or the drawings / plans as listed in Condition (2).

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies D3 & D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7.6 and 7B of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013), polices 1.1 (k) and 1.2 (f) of the adopted Development (Core) Strategy (2012). | The proposed rooflights hereby approved shall not project more than 150mm from the roof plane and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013). | No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policy D3 of the London Plan (2021).
